import React from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faEnvelope } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faTwitter, faGithub, faFacebook, faLinkedin, faInstagram, } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import INFO from "../../data/user"; import "./styles/socials.css"; const Socials = () => { return (
Follow on Twitter
{/*
Follow on GitHub
*/}
Follow on Facebook
Follow on LinkedIn
Follow on Instagram
{INFO.main.email}
); }; export default Socials;
